title: Cute Mom + Baby Costume Alert: A Cop and Her Donut!
text:
Picking the perfect group costume for your family can be tough. You want something that looks cute but is still comfortable to run around in — and that's where these mother-daughter halloween costumes come in. It doesn't matter if your daughter's interests revolve around book characters or her favorite movies — and even if she's just too young to be able to have an opinion on the matter, there's something on this list that the both of you will love.

Click through for some inspiration on costumes inspired by Phyllis Nefler from Troop Beverly Hills, a sweet little mouse named Chrysanthemum, and even the Chiquita Banana lady. P.S. If your daughter is dressing up for school without you, we also have some adorable kids costumes just for her.
